description:
Section 73 application to vary Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission P2021/3358/FUL, dated 19/08/2022 Reinstatement of 2 pitched roofs and gables at third floor level to No. 19 Clerkenwell Close with new louvred plant enclosure beyond, increase in height of Mansard Roof extension to roof of Nos. 20 and 21 Clerkenwell Close, provision of a green roof at first floor level at rear of Nos. 20 and 21 Clerkenwell Close, thermal upgrade to existing flat roof across Nos. 19, 20 and 21 Clerkenwell Close; historic reinstatements, new replacement windows to Nos. 19, 20 and 21 Clerkenwell Close, altered fenestrations, new side windows to Nos. 20 and 21 Clerkenwell Close, reconfiguration of internal layouts, relocation of plant and other minor external alterations and associated works'. 

The amendments sought comprise alterations to the approved steel gate at ground floor, replacement of a blank fire door to the ground floor side with a Georgian style panel door, raising of the rear mansard roof by 540mm.
decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Current Drawings and Documents: Dwg H562 - HUT - ZZ - 00 - DR - A - P0010 Rev F; Dwg H562 - HUT - ZZ - 01 - DR - A - P0011 Rev F; Dwg H562 - HUT - ZZ - 02 - DR - A - P0012 Rev F; Dwg H562 - HUT - ZZ - 03 - DR - A - P0013 Rev F; Dwg H562 - HUT - ZZ - 04 - DR - A - P0014 Rev F; Dwg H562 - HUT - ZZ - ZZ - DR - A - P0301 Rev G; Dwg H562 - HUT - ZZ - ZZ - DR - A - P0303 Rev F; Dwg H562 - HUT - ZZ - ZZ - DR - A - P0302 Rev G; Dwg MMA Schedule Of Changes Rev B - 26.01.23; Covering Letter dated 14 November 2022

P2021/3358/FUL Drawings and Documents: Dwg H562-HUT-ZZ-BM-DR-A-P0009 Rev C; Dwg H562-HUT-ZZ-00-DR-A-P0010 Rev D; Dwg H562-HUT-ZZ-01-DR-A-P0011 Rev D; Dwg H562-HUT-ZZ-02-DR-A-P0012 Rev D; Dwg H562-HUT-ZZ-03-DR-A-P0013 Rev D; Dwg H562-HUT-ZZ-04-DR-A-P0014 Rev D; Dwg H562-HUT-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-P0301 Rev D; Dwg H562-HUT-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-P0302 Rev C; Dwg H562-HUT-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-P0303 Rev C; Planning Statement by JMS Planning and Development Ltd; Heritage Statement by JMS Planning and Development Ltd; Sustainability and Energy Supporting Statement by Harley Haddow; Noise Impact Assessment by Clement Acoustics; Design and Access Statement by HUT; Daylight and Sunlight Report by Lumina London Ltd.


REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
